options.text: Worm: You did it… You defeated the Demon King and ended the age of terror!

You are the hero of our lands—the savior of every worm who dreamed of peace. Songs will be sung about your courage for generations.

Walk into the <color=#AE49FF>portal</color> one last time, champion. Hold your head high. Let your heart rest.

***<color=#AE49FF>============================================</color>***
